interface.description: This interface adds historical values to the interface to which it is aggregated. In the case there are multiple fields in the base interface, all fields can be aggregated, maintaining the same usage (required/optional) in the aggregated interface as in the original base interface.

field.description: Sampled value of `%0%` for a given point in time in history. The timestamp of the field records the time when the value was sampled.

sensorData.comment: **Note**: In the table above, `%0%` represents the name of the corresponding field in the original base interface.
